items.name: Cracked
meaning: Turns into a `Broken` tile when an <%=entity%> moves off of it.

items.name: Broken
meaning: Empty space, cannot be stood on normally.
_It will automatically revert to a `Normal` <%=tile%> after a period of time._

items.name: Empty
meaning: Entirely removed, and cannot be stood on normally.

items.name: Grass
meaning: This <%=tile%> has grass growing on it.

items.name: Holy
meaning: Reduces the damage that any <%=entity%> takes while standing on it.

items.name: Ice
meaning: Causes any <%=entity%> that walks onto it to slip, and try to move again in the same direction.

items.name: Lava
meaning: Damages any <%=entity%> that stands on it, then reverts to a `Normal` <%=tile%>.

items.name: Poison
meaning: Gradually damages any <%=entity%> that stands on it.

items.name: DirectionDown
meaning: Aconveyor belt that will try to move any <%=entity%> that stands on it downwards.

items.name: DirectionUp
meaning: A conveyor belt that will try to move any <%=entity%> that stands on it upwards.

items.name: DirectionLeft
meaning: A conveyor belt that will try to move any <%=entity%> that stands on it to the left.

items.name: DirectionRight
meaning: A conveyor belt that will try to move any <%=entity%> that stands on it to the right.

items.name: Hidden
meaning: Entirely removed, and cannot be stood on normally.
